extendedInfo.description: M-Stock Touch is a best assistant to monitor selected stocks.From now on, it is a more easy way to manage your investment in stocks.The design concept of M-Stock Touch starts with your selected stocks. After installed this software, you would immediately get market status and technical analysis of stocks. An alarm function is included. When a stock hits the specific price or quantity, M-Stock Touch would alarm you by graphical representation, vibration, or texts. Additionally, widget is the wonderful tool. If you utilize a widget, you could monitor the market status of your selected stocks without launching the application. This helps you quickly to buy or sell your stocks.â» Tablet version is available on Google Marketâ»
